full_summary:
=====================================

### Solicitation Number: W8486-228441/B
### Date of Publication: July 21, 2023
### Tender Closing Date: August 8, 2023
### Expected Contract Start Date: September 11, 2023
### Expected Contract End Date: December 8, 2023

### Notice Type: Invitation to Send a Proposal
### Procurement Category: Goods
### Procurement Method: Competitive - Open Bidding

### Description of the Procurement:
The Department of National Defence invites qualified suppliers to submit a proposal for the supply of Wipe Test Kits (WTK) to support the needs of the Canadian Armed Forces. The WTK must be a commercially available solution employed in industries to sample potentially contaminated areas with radioactivity on wet or dry surfaces.

The WTK must comprise the following components:

* A record folder consisting of a pressure-sensitive release paper that folds in half and is used to hold a self-adhesive cloth disc.
* A water-based adhesive self-adhesive cloth disc with the following characteristics:
	+ Made of non-hazardous synthetic fibers
	+ With a diameter size of 1.75 inches
	+ Capable of sampling contaminated areas with radioactivity on either wet or dry surfaces

### Quantities and Delivery Locations:
The following quantities of WTKs are required:

* 150 units, Unit of Issue: Box (BX), to be delivered to 25 Canadian Forces Support Establishment (CFSE) - Montreal
* 50 units, Unit of Issue: Box (BX), to be delivered to 7 Canadian Forces Supply Depot Edmonton

### Preference:
The Crown reserves the right to give preference to Canadian goods and/or services. Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

### Selection Criteria:
Proposal evaluation will be based on the lowest price submitted by the supplier.

### Tender Documents and Information:
For more information and to download the solicitation documents, please visit the [Canada Buys website](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/). The solicitation documents, including the terms and conditions of the contract, are available in English and French.

### Contact Information:
If you have any questions or concerns regarding this solicitation, please contact:

Pamela Horner
Canada Buys Team
[ Pamela.Horner@forces.gc.ca](mailto:Pamela.Horner@forces.gc.ca)
(343) 572-8721
101 Colonel By Drive, Ottawa, ON K1A 0K2
